  Validate that a string is a valid port range (start-end).

# function: port_range

Returns true when the input string matches a valid port range in the form 'start-end' with ports within 0..65535 and start <= end.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  ranges = [
    "80-8080",
    "0-65535",
  ]
}

output "port_range_example" {
  value = [
    for r in local.ranges : {
      range = r
      valid = provider::validatefx::port_range(r)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
port_range(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
